```{r}
bible <- readr::read_csv("C:/Users/inkyscope/Documents/projects/data/bible_kjv_new.csv") %>% 
  mutate(testament = ifelse(book %in% c("Matthew", "Mark", "Luke",
                                        "John", "Acts", "Romans", 
                                        "1 Corinthians", 
                                        "2 Corinthians",  "Galatians",
                                        "Ephesians", "Philippians",
                                        "Colossians", 
                                        "1 Thessalonians",
                                        "2 Thessalonians", 
                                        "1 Timothy", "2 Timothy",
                                        "Titus","Philemon",
                                        "Hebrews", "James", "1 Peter",
                                        "2 Peter", "1 John", "2 John",
                                        "3 John","Jude", "Revelation"), "New Testament", "Old Testament"))
```
```{r}


```

```{r}
bible <- bible %>% 
  unnest_tokens(word, text) %>% 
  anti_join(stop_words) %>% 
  group_by(testament) %>% 
  count(book, word, sort = T) 


df_waffle <- bible %>% 
  count(book, sort = T) %>% 
  arrange(-n) %>% 
  rename(total = n) %>% 
  mutate(wc = round(total / 100),
         book = factor(book, unique(book))) 

theme_waffle <- function() {
  theme_void() +
    theme(legend.position = "bottom",
          legend.text = element_text(size = 8,
                                     color = "#184b44"),
          plot.title = element_text(size = 14, 
                                    color = "#184b44",
                                    hjust = 0),
          axis.text = element_blank())
  
}
```


```{r}
library(PNWColors)

pals_old <- pnw_palette("Lake", 8, type = "discrete")
pals_new <- pnw_palette("Shuksan", 8, type = "discrete")

plot_old <- df_waffle %>% 
  filter(testament == "Old Testament",
         wc >= 22) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_waffle(aes(fill = book, values = wc),
              color = "white", 
              size = 1.3,
              n_rows = 5) +
  coord_equal() +
  scale_fill_manual(values = pals_old) +
  labs(title = "Books in Old Testament",
       fill = "") +
  theme_waffle()



plot_new <- df_waffle %>% 
  filter(testament == "New Testament",
         wc >= 10) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_waffle(aes(fill = book, values = wc),
              color = "white", 
              size = 1.3,
              n_rows = 5) +
  coord_equal() +
  scale_fill_manual(values = pals_new) +
  labs(title = "Books in New Testament",
       fill = "") +
  theme_waffle()

```


```{r}
title <- ggdraw() +
  draw_label("Length of Books in Old and New Testaments",
             color = "#36413d",
             hjust = .5,
             size = 20)

subtitle <- ggdraw() +
  draw_label("Each square represents 100 words",
             color = "#184b44",
             hjust = .5,
             size = 16)
 
caption <- ggdraw() +
  draw_label("Source: KJV | Graphic: Sung Inkyung",
             color = "#184b44",
             hjust = .5,
             size = 8)

p <- plot_grid(title, 
               subtitle,
               plot_old, 
               plot_new,
               caption,
               ncol = 1,
               rel_heights = c(.15, .07, .35, .35, .03 ))

ggsave(plot = p,
       filename = file.path("../day4", "day4_magical.png"),
       dpi = 300, width = 15, height = 15, units = "cm")

```
